Title: Body
Description:
A brew's body is an important and often overlooked factor.

To create the perfect consistency, I will need pristine eyes from the Bog Crocolisks to the east.

Take care. The creatures are quite vicious.
ObjectivesText: Collect 5 Pristine Crocolisk Eyes from Bog Crocolisks.
CompletionText: Watch your step in the swamp, my new friend.
RewardText: Do you have crocolisks where you are from?
